# OBJECT::SET_PROJECTILES_SHOULD_EXPLODE_ON_CONTACT

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** object
* **BOOL** explode

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Makes projectiles, such as grenades, automatically explode when this hit this object
